description:
I'm honestly surprised that Fedora KDE was the first spin to drop Xorg, I would have expected the main Fedora Workstation to do it, well turns out they weren't that far behind and are in fact the second to do so.

title: Another Fedora Spin Will Drop Xorg Support!
